alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 11 at 10:23PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Nuckolls, Fillmore and Thayer Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1022 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms generally along a line extending from near Friend to near Strang to near Ruskin. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pockets of half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Hebron, Deshler, Exeter, Fairmont, Shickley, Davenport, Milligan, Bruning, Alexandria, Grafton, Ruskin, Ohiowa, Carleton, Belvidere, Gilead and Strang. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
